description: System metrics dashboard using CloudWatch Container Insights for Flash Ticket EKS cluster

panels.description: Network traffic for all flash-ticket services (api, gateway, pay)
panels.title: Network Traffic (RX/TX)

targets.expression:
fields @message
| parse @message /"response_time_ms": (?<response_time>[0-9.]+)/
| filter response_time > 0
| stats avg(response_time) as avg_latency by bin(5m)

fields @message
| parse @message /"response_time_ms": (?<response_time>[0-9.]+)/
| filter response_time > 0
| stats pct(response_time, 95) as p95_latency by bin(5m)

fields @message
| parse @message /"response_time_ms": (?<response_time>[0-9.]+)/
| filter response_time > 0
| stats pct(response_time, 99) as p99_latency by bin(5m)

panels.description: HTTP Error Rate (%) - percentage of Error requests (4xx/5xx)

targets.expression:
fields @message
| filter @message like /"target_status_code": [0-9]+/
| parse @message /"status_code": (?<status>[0-9]+)/
| filter status >= 400 and status < 500
| stats count() as http_4xx

fields @message
| filter @message like /"target_status_code": [0-9]+/
| parse @message /"status_code": (?<status>[0-9]+)/
| filter status >= 500 and status < 600
| stats count() as http_5xx

fields @message
| filter @message like /"target_status_code":/
| stats count() as total_requests

panels.title: HTTP Error Rate (%)

panels.description: Cache hits vs misses - higher hit ratio is better
panels.title: ElastiCache - Cache Efficiency

panels.description: Number of current connections to ElastiCache Redis
panels.title: ElastiCache - Current Connections

panels.description: Number of keys evicted due to memory pressure
panels.title: ElastiCache - Evictions (Memory Pressure)

targets.expression:
filter @message like /\[error\]/
| stats count() as error_count by bin(5m)
targets.queryString: fields @timestamp | stats count() as log_count by bin(5m)

targets.expression:
fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /accepting AMQP/ or @message like /authenticated/ or @message like /closing AMQP/
| stats count() as Total_events by bin(5m)
targets.queryString: fields @message | filter @message like /Memory high watermark/ | stats count() as memory_events

title: Flash Ticket - System Metrics (CloudWatch)
